entry.title: New release for Grimoire: Release 0.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Develop by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/129

  • Latest fixes by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/132

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: Release 0.4.3

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: Release 0.4.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: Minor changes to Contributing.md by @Grazerquart in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/121
  • Latest fixes by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/132
  • Closes #133 by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/150
  • Fix issue #153: creation/update of root categories by @gpoussel in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/157
  • Fix issue #145: bookmarks without images by @gpoussel in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/156

New Contributors

  • @Grazerquart made their first contribution in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/121
  • @gpoussel made their first contribution in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/157

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4
